spiritsExplanation: The primary spirit of this workout is 'Soothing & Restorative,' as evidenced by the meditation's focus on transforming emotions, relieving stress, and achieving relaxation. The title itself, 'Transforming emotions | Guided Meditation,' highlights the intention of emotional healing. Keywords in the description such as 'relief from negative emotions,' 'deep relaxation,' and 'positive state of mind' further reinforce this classification. Additionally, tags like 'Healing,' 'Blissful Meditation,' and 'Feeling relaxed' suggest a focus on healing and relaxation, aligning well with the soothing and restorative nature. User comments praise the calming and comforting effects of the meditation, and describe experiences of profound relaxation, which confirms the spirit choice. The high confidence level reflects the explicit emphasis on relaxation and emotional transformation throughout the metadata.
